original_text: Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you. He will be like your valuable silver. 22: This verse is about the things that are most important in Job's life. He may have valuable things like silver and gold. But if he obeys God, then God will be more valuable to him than his silver and gold. Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you. He will be like your valuable silver. 22: This verse is about the things that are most important in Job's life. He may have valuable things like silver and gold. But if he obeys God, then God will be more valuable to him than his silver and gold. Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you. He will be like your valuable silver. 22: This verse is about the things that are most important in Job's life. He may have valuable things like silver and gold. But if he obeys God, then God will be more valuable to him than his silver and gold. Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you. He will be like your valuable silver. 22: This verse is about the things that are most important in Job's life. He may have valuable things like silver and gold. But if he obeys God, then God will be more valuable to him than his silver and gold. Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you.
korean_text: 그리하면 전능자가 네 보화가 되시며 네게 고귀한 은이 되시리니

sentences.original_text: Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 전능하신 하나님이 너에게 금처럼 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will be like your valuable silver.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 너의 귀한 은처럼 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: This verse is about the things that are most important in Job's life.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 구절은 욥의 삶에서 가장 중요한 것들에 대한 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He may have valuable things like silver and gold.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 은과 금과 같은 귀한 것들을 가질 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: then God will be more valuable to him than his silver and gold.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님이 그의 은과 금보다 더 귀한 존재가 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Then the Almighty God will be like gold for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 전능하신 하나님이 너에게 금처럼 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He will be like your valuable silver.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 너의 귀한 은처럼 될 것이다.
